RT @K_Rosa17: That large knife left three large scars on my upper left arm. I tried desperately to hide those scars for years. I show theâ€¦
RT @K_Rosa17: I was raped by all 3 men. One of these men â€” the largest and cruelest â€” held a large knife with an intricately carved handleâ€¦
RT @K_Rosa17: Two of my rapists were clean cut and the third was unshaven and smelled of gasoline. He wore a gold necklace with a cross arâ€¦
